title: My Favorite Trip
itunes:title: My Favorite Trip
description:
This episode is a departure from the last travel episode. Previously, Bobby and Sophie have shared their favorite travel stories from their trips together. But in this episode, the “Always Hungry” hosts expand on their favorite travel experiences, even if they weren’t together! Listen for European adventures from Sophie, behind the scenes details of Bobby’s time spent in Italy, and a special recipe segment inspired by these travels. 

For more information on “Always Hungry” follow the hosts on Instagram: 

Bobby Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay’s page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
